TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITrackingHandler

summary.span: 指示實作的物件必須由遠端基礎結構來告知關於物件和 Proxy 的封送處理、解封送處理 (Unmarshaling) 和中斷連接。

span.span: Indicates that the implementing object must be notified of marshaling, unmarshaling, and disconnection of objects and proxies by the remoting infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已註冊的每個物件物件或在目前的 proxy 時，會將遠端處理呼叫封送處理、 marshaling，或已中斷連線。Every object that is registered with is called by remoting when an object or proxy in the current is marshaled, unmarshaled, or disconnected. 請注意，只有物件可以中斷連線。Note that only objects can be disconnected. 擲回例外狀況時中斷連線的 proxy 上呼叫。An exception is thrown when disconnect is called on a proxy. > [!NOTE] > 這個介面可讓連結要求。This interface makes a link demand. 如果立即呼叫端會透過介面的參考呼叫，而且沒有基礎結構的權限，則會擲回安全性例外狀況。A SecurityException is thrown if the immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission. 請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)如需詳細資訊。See [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) for more information. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作的方法介面來接收通知，從遠端執行功能基礎結構。The following code example shows how to implement the methods of the interface to receive notifications from the remoting infrastructure. 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作這個介面。The following code example shows how to implement this interface. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices/CS/trackinghandler.cs#30)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作這個介面，在伺服器上。The following code example shows how to implement this interface on a server. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices/CS/server.cs#20)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作這個介面，如上述程式碼範例中的伺服器在用戶端上。The following code example shows how to implement this interface on a client for the server in the preceding code example. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices/CS/client.cs#0)] 下列程式碼範例示範使用伺服器和用戶端的遠端物件。The following code example shows the remote object that is used by the server and the client. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices/CS/remoteservice.cs#10)]

permission.span: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DisconnectedObject(object obj) cil managed

summary.span: 告知目前執行個體，物件已經自其 Proxy 中斷連接。

span.span: Notifies the current instance that an object has been disconnected from its proxy.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作這個方法。The following code example shows how to implement this method. 這個程式碼範例是所提供之較大範例的一部分介面。This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the interface. Public Sub MarshaledObject (obj As Object, or As ObjRef)

abstract member MarshaledObject : obj * System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef -> unit

span.span: The object that has been marshaled.

param.name: or
param.span: 自封送處理產生而且代表指定物件的 。

span.span: The that results from marshaling and represents the specified object.

summary.span: 告知目前執行個體，物件已經被封送處理。

span.span: Notifies the current instance that an object has been marshaled.

summary.span: 告知目前執行個體，物件已經解除封送處理。
